description: The languages offered by sona Linku.

propertyNames.description: A unique identifier for an object in Linku. Generally named after the object.

id.description: The language's code in Crowdin. Usually its 2 or 3 letter code.

locale.description: The locale code corresponding to the language.

direction.description: The direction of the language's script.

en.description: The name of the language in English.

endonym.description: The name of the language in that language. Prefer if available.

tok.description: The name of the language in Toki Pona.
